sections.comments: Do NOT contact the professor regarding registration problems.Please check back regularly to see if space opens up in the class.   Priority will be given to students requiring the course as a core component to their program and to Civil Engineering students requesting the course as a technical elective (if applicable).  If you cannot register because of the registration restriction please register to the waitlist and meet the instructor on the first day of the class.

description: Local site effects, soil-structure-interaction, liquefaction, seismic slope stability, seismic design of retaining structures; advanced methods in geotechnical earthquake engineering.
